class.name: PIXI.InteractionData
class.help: Holds all information related to an Interaction event

public.name: getLocalPosition

returns.help: A point containing the coordinates of the InteractionData position relative to the DisplayObject

public.help: This will return the local coordinates of the specified displayObject for this InteractionData

parameters.name: displayObject
parameters.help: The DisplayObject that you would like the local coords off

parameters.name: [point]
parameters.help: A Point object in which to store the value, optional (otherwise will create a new point)

public.name: global
public.help: This point stores the global coords of where the touch/mouse event happened

public.name: originalEvent
public.help: When passed to an event handler, this will be the original DOM Event that was captured

public.name: target
public.help: The target Sprite that was interacted with
